question:
Which of the following statements are correct regarding judicial system during the Sultanate period?
1. Chief Qazi was the head of the judicial department.
2. Muslim personal law or sharia was followed in civil matters.
3. The Hindus were governed by their own personal law and their cases were dispensed by the village panchayats.
Select the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation: During the Sultanate period Chief Qazi was the head of the judicial department. In civil matters Muslim personal law or sharia was followed whereas Hindus were governed by their own personal law and their cases were dispensed by the village panchayats.
